{"id":1237911301,"question_id":3404,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1713673201,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"14 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1237911301/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Satisfy Conditions","memory":"203 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumOperations(int[][] grid) {\n        int m = grid.length;\n        int n = grid[0].length;\n        int[][] dp = new int[n][10];\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            int[] cnt = new int[10];\n            for(int j = 0; j < m; j++) {\n                cnt[grid[j][i]]++;\n            }\n            for(int j = 0; j < 10; j++) {\n                dp[i][j] = m-cnt[j];\n            }\n        }\n        int[][] dpp = new int[n][10];\n        for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) dpp[0][i] = dp[0][i];\n        for(int i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n            for(int j = 0; j < 10; j++) {\n                int min = 1000000;\n                for(int k = 0; k < 10; k++) {\n                    if(k!=j) min = Math.min(min, dpp[i-1][k]);\n                }\n                dpp[i][j] = min + dp[i][j];\n            }\n        }\n        int ans = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) ans = Math.min(ans, dpp[n-1][i]);\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-satisfy-conditions","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
